repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The name of the auther is found in the manuscript is Kṛṣṇayajvan or Kṛṣṇa Dīkṣita. Mimāṃsāparibhāṣā is written on the front guard folio. Sticker is glued on the Pari of the word paribhāṣā so there two letters are not legible. Folio are damaged due to broken leaf or wormholes.

msItem.title: Mimāṃsāparibhāṣā
msItem.author: Kṛṣṇayajvan
msItem.rubric: (1v 1) sūryyanārāyaṇaṃdevaṃ śivaṃ tripurasundariṃ yān adhigatārthānca nirantaramahaṃ bhaje bālānāṃ śāstrasidhyarthaleśabodhāya dhīmatā mimāṃsāparibhāṣeyam kriyate (1v 2) kṛṣṇayajvanā .
msItem.incipit: (1v 2) iha khalu maharṣiṇā (4 letters crossed.) dvādaśalakṣaṇyāṃ pūrvamimāṃsāyāṃ dharmādharmauvevānuṣṭhānopayogitayā vicāritau tatra vedabodhiteṣṭasā (1v 3) dhanatāko dharmmaḥ yathā yāgādiḥ .
msItem.explicit: (35r 1) atha vikalpe aṣṭadoṣā vilikhyante dharmaśāstraṃ śrutiśāstrṃ ityādi teṣu vikalpaśāstreṣu draṣṭavyaṃ .
msItem.finalRubric: (35r 1)iti mimāṃsāparibhāṣā samāptā (35r 2) hariḥ oṃ śubhāmastu . varṇasāmidāsena viduṣāṃ toṣahetave mimāṃsāparibhāṣeyaṃ likhitā bālabodhini śrimate ve(gap of a letter due to hole.) ṭagura (35r 3) ve namaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu .

support.p: Palm leaf is used as guard folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin of the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Leaf are broken and have wormholes.

handNote.desc: well written. Some clusters are unclear.

additions.desc: Mimāṃsāparibhāṣā is written on the front guard folio. Sticker is glued on the Pari of the word paribhāṣā.
103 is written in pink chalk on the front guard folio and at the end also.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl: Mīmāṃsā Paribhāṣā of Kṛṣṇayajvan Swami Madhavananda, The Radhakrishna Mission Sarada Pitha Belur Math Dr. Howrah Calcutta. 1948.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) sūryyanārāyaṇaṃdevaṃ śivaṃ tripurasundariṃ yān adhigatārthānca nirantaramahaṃ bhaje bālānāṃ śāstrasidhyarthaleśabodhāya dhīmatā mimāṃsāparibhāṣeyam kriyate (1v 2) kṛṣṇayajvanā . iha khalu maharṣiṇā (4 letters crossed.) dvādaśalakṣaṇyāṃ pūrvamimāṃsāyāṃ dharmādharmauvevānuṣṭhānopayogitayā vicāritau tatra vedabodhiteṣṭasā (1v 3) dhanatāko dharmmaḥ yathā yāgādiḥ .
(35r 1) atha vikalpe aṣṭadoṣā vilikhyante dharmaśāstraṃ śrutiśāstrṃ ityādi teṣu vikalpaśāstreṣu draṣṭavyaṃ . iti mimāṃsāparibhāṣā samāptā (35r 2) hariḥ oṃ śubhāmastu . varṇasāmidāsena viduṣāṃ toṣahetave mimāṃsāparibhāṣeyaṃ likhitā bālabodhini śrimate ve(gap of a letter due to hole.) ṭagura (35r 3) ve namaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu .
